entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:40 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
